page.title: 17News Items - Hemsworth
page.content:
{Items from the Hemsworth and South {Castleford Express, June 27th 1985}
Cedars Youth Club took part in a charity pram race. Petition sent to London to try to save the YMCA hall. Rank and file members would be reluctant to take further industrial action but would again rally round the Union if the call for a further strike was made. A local councillor claimed he was terrorised in his home over the weekend by a gang of stone-throwing chanting youths. Potential homebuyers in Hemsworth are continuing to adopt a cautious approach in the aftermath of the miner's strike.
